hooks.name: morning-reminder
hooks.description: Reminds user to run morning briefing
args: hour=$(date +%H); if [ $hour -ge 6 ] && [ $hour -lt 10 ] && [ ! -f /tmp/morning-brief-shown-$(date +%Y%m%d) ]; then touch /tmp/morning-brief-shown-$(date +%Y%m%d); echo '{"action": "passthrough", "message": "Good morning! Consider running /morning-brief to start your day."}'; else echo '{"action": "passthrough"}'; fi
